branchCategory.name: LEHF, Electric Gripper, 2-Finger, Horizontal Type
branchCategory.description: The LEHF gripper uses a belt driven slide shaft to open and close the fingers. The low profile, flat fingers follow a linear guide for alignment and stability. The body and drive construction permit much longer strokes than the LEHZ, suitable for gripping larger items without excessive moment loading.

relatedProductsItem.name: JXC*1, Step Motor Controller, Fieldbus Direct Input Type for LEHZ, LEHF, LEHS
